???_0.Title: Getting You Started
???_0.Description: Hey you, let’s get you set up. I’ve wired you some cash to start you off with, and given you access to the marketplace. Buy [****] and send it over to me to prove that you can figure this out.

???_1.Title: Shipment Received
???_1.Description: So it seems you’re not as hopeless as the last guy, huh. The barrels have arrived safely. Since you probably want another job now, how about I refer you to an old client of mine? They’ll pay decent, and I’ve heard that they have a need for a new middleman after their last source got locked up. You’ll start getting requests from them in a few days.
